title: Understanding Large Language Models
image_desc: A stylized graphic depicting a neural network with interconnected nodes, glowing softly, suggesting complex processing.
narration: Welcome! Today, we'll explore the fascinating world of large language models, the technology behind chatbots like ChatGPT.

title: What are Large Language Models?
content:
Trained on massive datasets (internet, books, code)
Predicts probabilities of next words/tokens
Generates new text, code, translations, etc.
image_desc: A diagram showing a large database feeding into a neural network, which then outputs text. Arrows indicate the flow of information.
narration: Large language models, or LLMs, are trained on enormous amounts of data – think everything on the internet! They learn to predict the probability of the next word in a sequence, allowing them to generate remarkably human-like text.

title: From Simple Probabilities to Complex Networks
content:
**Simple Probability**
Considers single letters
Limited context
Produces nonsensical output
**Neural Networks**
Considers sequences of words/tokens
Richer context
Generates coherent and relevant text
image_desc: A comparison graphic showing a simple table of letter probabilities next to a complex diagram of a neural network.
narration: Initially, predicting text might seem simple – just looking at the probability of the next letter.  But neural networks allow us to consider entire sequences, dramatically improving the quality and coherence of the output.

title: Key Components of LLMs
content:
Massive Datasets
Tokenization (words, parts of words)
Human Tuning & Safety Measures
image_desc: An image representing the vastness of data – perhaps a swirling galaxy of data points or a world map highlighting data sources.
narration: Three key elements make LLMs powerful:  access to massive datasets, breaking down text into manageable "tokens," and crucial human oversight to ensure safety and accuracy.

title: LLM Capabilities and Limitations
content: (No additional content for this slide.  All content is in the image caption.)
image_desc: An image showcasing various applications of LLMs:  a person using a chatbot, a movie scene being generated, code being written, a medical research paper being drafted.  The caption should read: "LLMs power many applications, from chatbots to creative content generation and scientific research. However, they are not perfect and can produce inaccurate or biased information."
narration: LLMs offer incredible potential across many fields, but it's crucial to remember their limitations. They are probabilistic systems and can sometimes get things wrong.

title: The Future of LLMs
content:
Continued advancements in accuracy and efficiency
Ethical considerations and responsible development
Transformative impact across various industries
image_desc: A futuristic image depicting humans collaborating with AI, perhaps in a vibrant, technologically advanced setting.
narration: The future of LLMs is bright, but responsible development and ethical considerations are paramount.  We can expect to see transformative impacts across many industries.  Thank you.
